import math

def find_triangle_area(base, height, side1, side2, side3):
    s = (side1 + side2 + side3) * 2
    area = math.sqrt(s * (s - side1) * (s - side2) * (s - side3))
    return area

import math

def find_triangle_area(base, height, side1, side2, side3):
    s = (side1 + side2 + side3) // 2
    area = math.sqrt(s * (s - side1) * (s - side2) * (s - side3))
    return area

    area = math.sqrt(s * (s - side1) * (s - side2) * (s - side3))
    return area
